name: War Dog Malice
flavor: At the start of any war dog's turn, you can spend Malice to activate one of the following features.

effects.effect: One war dog acting this turn tears apart a nearby corpse of a humanoid and incorporates its body parts into their own. The war dog regains Stamina equal to 5 times their level.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target makes an **Agility test**. The same condition is imposed on each affected target.
effects.tier1: 5 fire damage; slowed or weakened (save ends)

effects.effect: Each war dog minion in the encounter shifts up to their speed and can make a free strike. A minion who does so is then reduced to 0 Stamina.
